page.title: 06KINGSCLERE ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are lots of activities in Kingsclere, such as clubs and groups for leisure-time activity. There is a {Gardening Association,}which runs flower shows twice a year, and sells seeds and tools and plants. There are{keep-fit classes}to keep you fit and healthy. Many ladies belong to the{Women's {Institute,}where they hear talks on various subjects. Some people serve on the{Parish {Council}to help the village and its inhabitants. They give a lot of time to make the village a better place. There are{jumble sales.}At these we buy clothes, toys, sweets and cakes, and raise money for different causes. The{Community Association}is trying to raise money at present for a new centre, as we have no large hall for village meetings.
